name: SecureIAM Corp
response: Our platform provides comprehensive identity and access management with automated account lifecycle management. We maintain detailed inventories including usernames, full names, department assignments, and start/stop dates. Quarterly validation processes ensure all accounts are authorized and compliant with enterprise policies.

name: ComplianceBot
response: Basic user directory service with manual account tracking. Limited reporting capabilities for account status and basic user information.

name: MFA Solutions Inc
response: Enterprise-grade multi-factor authentication for all externally-exposed applications. Supports SAML, OAuth, and directory service integration. Comprehensive reporting and policy enforcement across all access points.
